mapper.insert: insert into publisher(`name`, `remark`, `created_by`, `creation_time`, `updated_by`, `last_updated_time`, `revision`) values (#{entity.name}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.createdBy}, NOW(), #{entity.updatedBy}, NOW(), 0)
mapper.update:
update publisher p
p.`name` = #{entity.name},
p.`remark` = #{entity.remark},
p.`updated_by` = #{entity.updatedBy},
p.`last_updated_time` = NOW(), p.`revision` = (p.`revision` + 1) % 2147483647
where p.`id` = #{id} and p.`revision` = #{entity.revision};
mapper.select: select p.`id`, p.`name`, p.`remark`, p.`created_by`, p.`creation_time`, p.`updated_by`, p.`last_updated_time`, p.`revision` from publisher p where p.`id` = #{id}

select
p.`name`,
p.`remark`,
p.`revision`
from publisher p where p.`id` = #{id}
